segments.text: Hi there Mr . Anderson ! How are you on this fine morning ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It sure is cold this morning , isn ’ t it ? I barely even get out of bed !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . It ’ s pretty cold , alright .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you catch the news this morning ? I heard that there was a fire on Byron Street .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I didn ’ t hear about that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you happen to watch the football game last night ? The Patriots scored in the last minute !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I don ’ t like football .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh . . . By the way , I saw you with your daughter at the office Christmas party . She is really beautiful !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She ’ s my wife ! Oh , here ’ s my floor ! Nice talking to you . Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir this is the 56th floor ! We are on the 70th !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s okay , I ’ ll take the stairs !
segments.speaker: S1
